item.title: Rogue Commercial Big, 22nd November
item.description:
We think this is from one of the commercial businesses on the OKR . There is a daily fly tipping problem on this road. This is encouraging it yet further. Please remove as soon as you can. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cobourg Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime bikes blocking pavement at Seymour Street side of Hyatt Regency Hotel, 22nd November
item.description:
Lime bikes blocking pavement at Seymour Street jn to Portman Square near hyatt regency London hotel need to fix it causing hazard and nuisance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Seymour Street, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Bus Lane markings not visible, 22nd November
item.description:
Hello, Iâ€™m a Bus Driver on the 185 and the Bus Lane markings at the end of the Bus Lane going north bound on the Vauxhall Bridge have faded. Please can they be repainted?

item.title: Rough sleeping + smell of hurine + rubbish dumped, 22nd November
item.description:
Eccleston Square and the area around the station is becoming a junkyard. Please take a structural look at this and consider moving the bins to Belgrave Road as these are attracting mice, foxes and junkies. Zombies are constantly walking around taking and selling drugs and no effective actions are taken. The situation has deteriorated dramatically in the last year.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hugh Street, Victoria, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wivenhoe Close, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Debris of rough sleeping, 22nd November
item.description:
A mattress, clothes, food litter - all soaking wet due to the rain - likely left behind by a rough sleeper on Belgrave Road next to rubbish bins. The area is connotated also by a strong smell of urine.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eccleston Square, Victoria, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Signs left behind after pavement repair over a week ago, 22nd November
item.description:
Pavement was repaired outside 55 Parkhurst Road over a week ago. The pavement was closed off for a day. Road signs were used to warn drivers. The road signs have been left behind, causing pedestrians and prams to walk in road. Please have someone pick them up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Parkhurst Road, Bexley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harfield Gardens, Camberwell, Greater London

item.title: Black bollard on corner of Fordwych Road and Minster Road, 22nd November
item.description:
This bollard is black and unlit. On Friday 14th Nov it was dark and wet and busy and I scraped my car against this bollard as it was invisible. Please add white paint or something to make it visible! Fortunately my insurance will cover the damage but your action would prevent further accidents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fordwych Road, Kilburn, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress on the pavement, 22nd November
item.description:
Someone has left a double bed mattress on the pavement outside 16 Farleigh Road. It has been there for at least one week.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Farleigh Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
